TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tausa, title = Tausa, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tausa} }

S.FORM: Tausa Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Tausa a niyaro', 12 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 592 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 578 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq73 , Tayal10 , Amis2 , Bunun2 , Paiwan1 , Truku6 , roma5 . Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
